snippet: Recent gains suggest that investors are becoming more comfortable with the prospect of the Federal Reserve slowing its economic stimulus.
abstract: Stocks rise for fourth straight session as investors seem optimistic that companies will be able to surpass relatively low forecasts for the earnings season, possibly prolonging the rally.
lead_paragraph: Recent gains suggest that investors are becoming more comfortable with the prospect of the Federal Reserve slowing its economic stimulus.

headline.main: Market Rises for Fourth Straight Day on Hope Earnings Will Exceed Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Market Rises for Fourth Straight Day on Hope Earnings Will Exceed Forecasts
